content.question: In her work Earth's Creation, Emily Kame Kngwarreye recontextualizes her Australian Aboriginal beliefs in order to create a more personal artistic vision by

choices.label: enlarging traditional Australian Aboriginal iconography onto a monumental scale
rejecting figurative art traditions in favor of embracing European modernist abstraction
fusing traditional cultural motifs with materials and techniques from Western artistic traditions
abandoning traditional Australian Aboriginal art style in favor of inventing completely new techniques

content.answer: fusing traditional cultural motifs with materials and techniques from Western artistic traditions

topic.text: 10.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or groups of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice.
